page.title: 12CRIME IN BELLSHILL
page.content: In the past ten years there have been few major crimes in Bellshill.There was one case of rape, the perpetrator of which was arrested, and the murder of Lorna Porter.This murder is as yet unsolved. The most common type of crime in Bellshill is vandalism- the smashing of windows, writing on walls, the wrecking of gardens, trains, buses.Schools wewre broken into on a number of occasions and valuable equipment stolen or damaged. The average age of the people committing these crimes is 12 - 18 years.This crme rate amongst the young people is attributed to the problems of adolescence, that these crimes are being committed to draw the attention of the older folks to their needs The Crime rate has risen 15% in two years.
